title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.21 - Direct admissions from emergency room
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.21 - Direct admissions from emergency room

State Regulations
(a) To the specific discrete unit under each

Daily Hospital Service Area. (1)

Acute Care

Services (accounts 6010-6290). (2)

Intensive Care Services (accounts 6310-6410). (3)

Nursery Services (account 6510 or
6520). (4)

Sub-Acute Care Services
(accounts 6610-6690). (b) Total must agree with the difference
between Emergency Services visits reported per section
446.20
(a)(1)(iii)
and section
446.20
(a)(2)
of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
446.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
